name: Legion of Super Heroes: Dawnstar Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Dawnstar.

	Dawnstar uses no alternate code name.     Laura Bailey is an actress who provided the voice for Dawnstar in the animated movie, "JLA Advnetures: Trapped in Time".

Starhaven.

	Starhaven is home to a civilization that was founded entirely from Earth native Anasazi Indians.  They were genetically experimented on, which resulted in them having wings.

questions.text: Dawnstar is introduced to the Legion by Wildfire.  He asks her to help them in tracking down the Resource Raiders.  Where did he find her?
questions.correct: She was member of the Legion Academy
options: She had previously auditioned for Legion membership
How they met was never expanded upon
questions.explanation:
She was member of the Legion Academy.

	Dawnstar is introduced in 'Superboy and the Legion of Super Heroes' #226 (1977).  Before joining the Legion Academy, her family operated a business selling her abilities to rich individuals for various purposes.

questions.text: Who was Dawnstar's dorm mate before she was extended membership in the Legion of Super Heroes?
questions.explanation:
Laurel Kent.

	This is revealed in the same back up story that provide's Dawnstar's origin.  ('Superboy and the Legion of Super Heroes' #240, 1978)

questions.text: The inhabitants of Dawnstar's home planet share most of her extraordinary powers.  Which of the following powers is unique to Dawnstar?
questions.correct: Ability to track anyone or any thing across light years of distance in outer space
options: Ability to go without oxygen in outer space
Ability to track anyone or any thing across light years of distance in outer space
Ability to survive the temperatures of outer space
Ability to travel at superluminal speeds in outer space
questions.explanation:
Ability to track anyone or any thing across light years of distance in outer space.

	Dawnstar's tracking abilities are unique to her, and were a mutation that she was born with.  Her native abilities make her the fastest Legionnaire in zero gravity environments.

questions.text: Dawnstar had what can only be described as a somewhat "tragic" romantic relationship with which of her fellow Legionnaires?
questions.explanation:
Wildfire.

	Dawnstar and Wildfire were both very outspoken personalities.  They maintained immense attraction to each other.  But because Wildfire's "being" was housed in a containment suit, any type of physical relationship between them was impossible.

questions.text: In the Legion's "Five Year Later" continuity, Dawnstar is featured, but at first she is lacking her wings and possessed by a foreign entity.  What name does she go by?
questions.explanation:
Bounty.

	She was possessed by an evil entity known as Bounty, and that was the name she was using for herself.  Bounty severed her wings and forced her to use her abilities as an assassin.

questions.text: In the Legion's "Five Year Later" continuity, Dawnstar now has a tattoo of a skull.  Where on her body is this tattoo?
questions.explanation:
Lower right cheek.

	When Dawnstar returns, as Bounty, she has this new tattoo.  It, along with her lack of wings and altered personality were the reason many former Legionnaires didn't recognize who she was.

questions.text: In the Legion of Super Heroes' "threeboot" continuity, Dawnstar is featured in only one issue.  She appears prominently on the cover along with Blok and Tyroc.  In this continuity, what status do these three share?
questions.correct: They are simply Legion urban legends
options: They are members of the Legion Academy
They are members of the Legion of Substitute Heroes
The three join the Legion and are killed off in the same issue
questions.explanation:
They are simply Legion urban legends.

	In 'Legion of Super Heroes' vol. 5, #15 (2006), the adventures of these three Legionnaires (along with many others) were the stuff of campfire stories, told by children.

questions.text: In the Legion's "retroboot" (New 52) continuity, members of the Legion believe that Dawnstar, along with six other Legionnaireas, has perished in an accident.  Where were these seven Legion members actually?
questions.explanation:
Trapped in the 21st century.

	Dawnstar, along with Tellus, Tyroc, Wildfire, Chameleon Girl, Timber Wolf and Gates, were trapped in their past as the result of a Time Bubble malfunction.  ('Legion Lost' vol. 2, 2011 - 2013)
